snippet: Los Angeles Rams running back Tre Mason was subdued twice with a stun gun when he refused to cooperate with officers who were arresting him on charges of reckless driving and marijuana possession, the police in Hollywood, Fla., said.
abstract: Los Angeles Rams running back Tre Mason is arrested on charges of reckless driving and marijuana possession in Hollywood, Fla.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Rams running back Tre Mason was subdued twice with a stun gun when he refused to cooperate with officers who were arresting him on charges of reckless driving and marijuana possession, the police in Hollywood, Fla., said.

headline.main: Stun Gun Used on Rams’ Tre Mason
